text: Lycidola expansa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1881. It is known from Costa Rica, Colombia, and Panama.BioLib.cz - Lycidola expansa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1881
title: Lycidola expansa
